author: Chaim Gartenberg
title: Here’s how Apple and Google will track the coronavirus with Bluetooth
description: Apple and Google are working on a novel coronavirus contact tracing system designed to help monitor and track people who have come in contact with infected people. The system relies on Bluetooth — specifically, Bluetooth LE — to communicate between devices. H…
content:
Is Bluetooth good enough to track the novel coronavirus?
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
